name: Coffee-Ginger Barbecue Sauce
description: For this easy barbecue sauce, a ketchup base is spiked with a half cup of strong coffee, freshly grated ginger, a little dark chocolate, and molasses. Just a hint of smoked paprika builds an extra layer of aromatic mystery.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup strong coffee or espresso (see note)
1 (2-inch) knob peeled fresh ginger, grated on a microplane
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, combine ketchup, coffee, Worcestershire sauce, molasses, and ginger and bring to a low simmer, stirring occasionally, over medium heat. Stir in chocolate and smoked paprika until chocolate is melted, then let simmer over very low heat, stirring occasionally, until flavors have mellowed and melded, 5-10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
